feed.title: St. Peters Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 07:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: W 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas before morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 late this evening then northwest 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
